statements: SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 20 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT id, location, timestamp FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE weather_condition = 'Sunny'
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT id, location, weather_condition FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature < 10
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT id, location, timestamp FROM WeatherData WHERE weather_condition = 'Rainy' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature < 20 AND humidity > 60 ORDER BY location ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, weather_condition FROM WeatherData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-06-30' ORDER BY location DESC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE city_name = 'New York';
SELECT city_name, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT city_name, timestamp FROM weather_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(temperature) AS min_temp FROM weather_data;
SELECT city_name, COUNT(*) AS alert_count FROM alerts GROUP BY city_name HAVING alert_count > 2;
SELECT city_name, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 20 ORDER BY city_name ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, city_name, temperature, humidity, timestamp FROM weather_data ORDER BY temperature DESC, city_name ASC
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT city_name, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM weather_data GROUP BY city_name HAVING avg_temp > 25
SELECT city_name, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE alert_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(temperature) AS min_temp FROM WeatherData;
SELECT location, coverage_type, coverage_amount FROM InsuranceCoverage WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, location, timestamp, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity > 60 ORDER BY location ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, location, coverage_type, coverage_amount FROM InsuranceCoverage WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY location, coverage_amount DESC LIMIT 20
SELECT location, alert_type, alert_message, timestamp FROM Alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Weather Alert' ORDER BY location, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, location, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND temperature > 20 AND humidity < 80 ORDER BY location ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM WeatherStation;
SELECT station_name, location, latitude FROM WeatherStation WHERE id = 1;
SELECT station_name, latitude, longitude FROM WeatherStation ORDER BY station_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 80;
SELECT station_name, location, coverage_amount FROM WeatherStation JOIN InsuranceCoverage ON WeatherStation.id = InsuranceCoverage.station_id;
SELECT station_name, location, latitude, longitude FROM WeatherStation WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND longitude < -100.0
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25.0 AND humidity < 70.0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT station_name, latitude, longitude, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherStation JOIN WeatherData ON WeatherStation.id = WeatherData.station_id WHERE temperature > 30.0 AND humidity > 80.0
SELECT * FROM Alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Severe' AND message LIKE '%warning%'

SELECT station_name, location, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherStation JOIN WeatherData ON WeatherStation.id = WeatherData.station_id JOIN InsuranceCoverage ON WeatherStation.id = InsuranceCoverage.station_id WHERE coverage_amount > 20000.0
SELECT * FROM WeatherData ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT timestamp, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE precipitation > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Alerts WHERE severity > 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT message, risk_level FROM Warnings WHERE risk_level = 2;
SELECT coverage_amount, policy_holder FROM InsuranceCoverage WHERE risk_level = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT message, severity FROM Alerts WHERE severity >= 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Warnings WHERE risk_level = 3 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT policy_holder, coverage_amount FROM InsuranceCoverage WHERE risk_level <= 2 ORDER BY coverage_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT log_id, alert_id, timestamp FROM AlertLog WHERE acknowledged = false ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 20;
